We visited our last night in Barcelona.  I wish we had went sooner,  if so I'm sure we would have dined here another time or two before we left!The restaurant is small, modern,  nicely appointed.  The hostess was friendly and sweet and seated for our reservation promptly.  Our waiter,  Diego,  was very knowledgeable about the menu and more than willing to spend time to describe the menu. Our first course, spicy meat empanadas were amazing.  The filling was moist with just a bit of spice.  The pastry was tender and crisp.  The best empanada I've had. Our second course was a pumpkin filled ravioli with pink sauce. I had to stop mid bite to savor the deliciousness!  I wanted 2 orders of this it was that good! We both ordered the Ribeye steaks. Cooked perfectly.  Served with roasted potatoes with cream.  We also had waffle potatoes with fried eggs,  I can't explain how good these taste. For dessert we had a caramel mousse which was light and satisfying. Overall,  this was an amazing dining experience that I would not hesitate to recommend to all!
